sys_ux_client_script.name: Record Modal

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_d194b4bb1b6cd5106a08a9b4bd4bcbc2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">a38470bb1b6cd5106a08a9b4bd4bcb6d</macroponent><name>Record Modal</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
        api,
        event,
        imports,
        helpers
    }) {
    
    const { name, payload: { route, fields, params, size = 'md', ariaLabel}} = event;
    
    if (name === 'RECORD#CLOSE_MODAL')
        helpers.modal.close();
    
    else if (name === 'RECORD#OPEN_MODAL') {
        if (!route)
            return;
        
        api.setState('bare', true);
        api.setState('displayOptions', { size: size, label: ariaLabel });
        api.setState('contents', {
            route: route,
            fields: fields,
            params: params
        });
    }
    
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>David.Admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-14 07:52:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>d194b4bb1b6cd5106a08a9b4bd4bcbc2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Record Modal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Working From Home (WFH)" source="x_852034_wfh">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Working From Home (WFH)">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d194b4bb1b6cd5106a08a9b4bd4bcbc2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>David.Admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-14 08:18:18</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
